extendedInfo.description: This widget pack contains next toggles:- AirplaneMode- APN- AutoRotate- AutoSync- Bluetooth- Brightness- GPS (shortcut for honeycomb and up)- LockScreen- Network 2G/3G (shortcut)- ScreenTimeout- SilentMode- WiFiWhy APN doesn't work on ICS and Jelly Bean?- Because Google suddenly decided to remove this feature for developers: http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=24227For HC, ICS, Jelly Bean and up, you need to add widget from AllApps -> Widgets -> Select OnOff Widget from the listFor older versions: long click on empty space on your home screen -> Widgets -> Select OnOff Widget from the listADD WIDGET TO THE HOME SCREEN!!!Also added support for skins.Email us if you have problems.

reviews.title: Lock screen widget!
reviews.comment: Please can we have a widget that functions as a single tap to lock and turn the screen off (compatible with Samsung S3)? Added request here as still to hear from dev via email. All else great with this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs update for ICS
reviews.comment: APN widget STILL doesn\'t work on Samsung Galaxy S2 with the ICS update. It causes my phone to lock up and I have to reboot it every time I try to use that particular widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great widgets. Very simple and clean.
reviews.comment: Developer will help if you are having problems. Please donate if you like his work. Android devs need support or all the good ones will go to crApple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: APN Widget
reviews.comment: Please fix APN widget asap - Freezes & locks up mobile.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice switches great look needs update.
reviews.comment: Needs a 3G-4G toggle switch otherwise I love this pack!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GPS on off broken
reviews.comment: This used to be a great app but now the on off widget for GPS does not work

reviews.comment: Clean and simple

reviews.title: Galaxy Ace 2
reviews.comment: All works as promised!

reviews.title: APN widget
reviews.comment: This widget kept faulting out. Meaning the widget would display one thing when it was really the other. Had to uninstall then reinstall, a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice widgets. Needs Flashlight. Lock screen only enables/disables the pattern lock, doesn\'t disable the slide lock on Android 2.1 on X10 mini.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Where did the bar go?/
reviews.comment: This used to be good.  But now i cant add the on-off bar as one unit  - only individual icons.  That sucks, and there is no help or controls at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for quite a while now. I do like this app a lot... however since I\'ve had it not 1 update! Also only 3 decent looking skins. UPDATE!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great widgets. Just one minor issue. The Brightness widget does not \"close window on select\" when Auto is clicked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the glitches
reviews.comment: Used to work great, but started to be glitchy with gingerbread and is now very glitchy with ice cream sandwich. Please fix the issues to get 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Couldn\'t get app to work after install. Wouldn\'t allow me to apply the config settings. Pity as it looks like it would be great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Allthe best easily downloaded
reviews.comment: Best way I can show  how fab these widgets are.....I paid  forthem! Fab!

reviews.comment: Dev put air push spam ads in his Notes app, spamming status bar of phone. Boycotting all his apps as a result. I don\'t support spammers!

reviews.comment: The stock HTC widgets are better. Plus, after uninstall, Curvefish would not give refund.

reviews.comment: APN widget doesnt even turn on data. Will give 5 stars if this is fixed!
